course_title: Linear Partial Differential Equations: Analysis and Numerics
course_description: This course provides students with the basic analytical and computational tools of linear partial differential equations (PDEs) for practical applications in science engineering, including heat / diffusion, wave, and Poisson equations. Analytics emphasize the viewpoint of linear algebra and the analogy with finite matrix problems. Numerics focus on finite-difference and finite-element techniques to reduce PDEs to matrix problems. The {{% resource_link "1f921dc5-fdd1-4260-9756-24664ccd1ef8" "Julia Language" %}} (a free, open-source environment) is introduced and used in homework for simple examples.
title: Course Metadata
